name: MechDrive Beta 1 "Border Zone"
description:
This Beta is an extremely early work in progress and,

REQUIRES CONTROLLERS TO PLAY -- ideally 2.

select = reset

start on controller 2 spawns player 2

y = mech mode

dpad up = walk mode (only works at slow speeds)

left stick/right stick various movement and aiming functions

triggers: acceleration and braking

bumpers: shoot

a = stomp in walk mode
